clinical_study.brief_title: Pharmacodynamics of Omiganan BID in Patients With Atopic Dermatitis
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Study to Assess the Pharmacodynamics, Safety, Tolerability and Efficacy of Omiganan BID in Patients With Mild to Moderate Atopic Dermatitis

brief_summary.textblock: This study has a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled design to assess the efficacy, pharmacodynamics and safety/tolerability of omiganan in patients with mild to moderate atopic dermatitis when applied BID to all atopic dermatitis lesions.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.description: Assessment of health-related quality of life by measuring DLQI
Singe-Question assessment of pruritus and sleeplessness
Whole body photograph for qualitative and observational record
Skin temperature measurements will be taken
Analysis of biomarkers captured by Transdermal Analysis Patch

secondary_outcome.description: Adverse Events will be collected throughout the study
Vital Signs will be collected throughout the study
Lab samples collected in various timepoints within the study
ECGs collected before beginning and end of study
